description: The OGC GeoSPARQL standard supports representing and querying geospatial data on the Semantic Web.  GeoSPARQL defines a vocabulary for representing geospatial data in RDF, and it defines an extension to the SPARQL query language for processing geospatial data.  In addition, GeoSPARQL is designed to accommodate systems based on qualitative spatial reasoning and systems based on quantitative spatial computations.

Feature.label: Feature
Feature.description: This class represents the top-level feature type. This class is       equivalent to GFI_Feature defined in ISO 19156:2011, and it is       superclass of all feature types.

Geometry.label: Geometry
Geometry.description: The class represents the top-level geometry type. This class is       equivalent to the UML class GM_Object defined in ISO 19107, and       it is superclass of all geometry types.

SpatialObject.label: SpatialObject
SpatialObject.description: The class spatial-object represents everything that can have       a spatial representation. It is superclass of feature and geometry.

asGML.label: asGML
asGML.description: The GML serialization of a geometry

asWKT.label: asWKT
asWKT.description: The WKT serialization of a geometry

coordinateDimension.label: coordinateDimension
coordinateDimension.description: The number of measurements or axes needed to describe the position of this      geometry in a coordinate system.

defaultGeometry.label: defaultGeometry
defaultGeometry.description: The default geometry to be used in spatial calculations.      It is Usually the most detailed geometry.

dimension.label: dimension
dimension.description: The topological dimension of this geometric object, which       must be less than or equal to the coordinate dimension.       In non-homogeneous collections, this will return the largest       topological dimension of the contained objects.

ehContains.label: contains
ehContains.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*TFF*FF*

ehCoveredBy.label: coveredBy
ehCoveredBy.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially covered       by the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFF*TFT**

ehCovers.label: covers
ehCovers.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially covers the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*TFT*FF*

ehDisjoint.label: disjoint
ehDisjoint.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially disjoint      from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FF*FF****

ehEquals.label: equals
ehEquals.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially equals the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFFTFFFT

ehInside.label: inside
ehInside.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially inside       the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFF*FFT**

ehMeet.label: meet
ehMeet.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially meets the       object SpatialObject.       DE-9IM: FT******* ^ F**T***** ^ F***T****

ehOverlap.label: overlap
ehOverlap.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially overlaps the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*T***T**

gmlLiteral.label: GML Literal
gmlLiteral.description: A GML serialization of a geometry object.

hasGeometry.label: hasGeometry
hasGeometry.description: A spatial representation for a given feature.

hasSerialization.label: has serialization
hasSerialization.description: Connects a geometry object with its text-based serialization.

isEmpty.label: isEmpty
isEmpty.description: (true) if this geometric object is the empty Geometry. If       true, then this geometric object represents the empty point       set for the coordinate space.

isSimple.label: isSimple
isSimple.description: (true) if this geometric object has no anomalous geometric       points, such as self intersection or self tangency.

rcc8dc.label: disconnected
rcc8dc.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially disjoint      from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FFTFFTTTT

rcc8ec.label: externally connected
rcc8ec.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially meets the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FFTFTTTTT

rcc8eq.label: equals
rcc8eq.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially equals the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFFTFFFT

rcc8ntpp.label: non-tangential proper part
rcc8ntpp.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially inside       the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFTFFTTT

rcc8ntppi.label: non-tangential proper part inverse
rcc8ntppi.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TTTFFTFFT

rcc8po.label: partially overlapping
rcc8po.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially overlaps the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TTTTTTTTT

rcc8tpp.label: tangential proper part
rcc8tpp.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially covered       by the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFTTFTTT

rcc8tppi.label: tangential proper part inverse
rcc8tppi.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially covers the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TTTFTTFFT

sfContains.label: contains
sfContains.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially contains the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*****FF*

sfCrosses.label: crosses
sfCrosses.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially crosses the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*T******

sfDisjoint.label: disjoint
sfDisjoint.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially disjoint       from the object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: FF*FF****

sfEquals.label: equals
sfEquals.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially equals the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: TFFFTFFFT

sfIntersects.label: intersects
sfIntersects.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is not spatially disjoint       from the object SpatialObject.      DE-9IM: T******** ^ *T******* ^ ***T***** ^ ****T****

sfOverlaps.label: overlaps
sfOverlaps.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially overlaps the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*T***T**

sfTouches.label: touches
sfTouches.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject spatially touches the       object SpatialObject.      DE-9IM: FT******* ^ F**T***** ^ F***T****

sfWithin.label: within
sfWithin.description: Exists if the subject SpatialObject is spatially within the       object SpatialObject. DE-9IM: T*F**F***

spatialDimension.label: spatialDimension
spatialDimension.description: The number of measurements or axes needed to describe the spatial position of       this geometry in a coordinate system.

wktLiteral.label: Well-known Text Literal
wktLiteral.description: A Well-known Text serialization of a geometry object.
